name: Sanguine Sanctum
description: It desires more. Feed It. Nourish It. Sanguine Sanctum is an atmospheric horror-exploration game with a low-poly, PS1 aesthetic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
